price: Diles [oh, Mujámmad]: "Solo invoco a mi Señor y no adoro a otro que Dios".
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
